_description: This file contains a mixed collection of API responses that tests jsonToLLMString's ability to handle: (1) Success responses with complex data structures, (2) Error responses with detailed error objects and resolution steps, (3) Partial success responses with warning arrays, (4) Rate limiting errors with retry information, (5) Authentication errors with scope details, (6) File content responses with code samples, (7) Metadata objects with performance metrics. This represents real-world API batch processing where some calls succeed and others fail.
_test_cases: Tests error handling, warning arrays (warnings->LIST), mixed data types, status indicators, and complex nested success/failure patterns

repository.name: awesome-project
repository.description: An amazing open-source project that revolutionizes development workflows

error.message: API rate limit exceeded. Please wait before making more requests.
Repository not found or you don't have access to it

possible_reasons: Repository is private and you don't have access
Repository name or organization name is misspelled
You don't have the required permissions

warnings.message: The 'styled-components' import pattern used is deprecated
Button component should include aria-label when used with icons only
warnings.suggestion: Add aria-label prop to ButtonProps interface

warnings.message: Consider memoizing the styled component to prevent unnecessary re-renders
warnings.suggestion: Wrap StyledButton with React.memo() or use useMemo for complex calculations

resolution_steps: Check that your personal access token is valid and hasn't expired
Ensure your token has the required scopes: repo, read:user, read:org
Regenerate your token if necessary from GitHub Settings > Developer settings > Personal access tokens
Update your application configuration with the new token

package.name: @types/react
package.author: DefinitelyTyped
package.readme:
# Installation
> `npm install --save @types/react`

# Summary
This package contains type definitions for React (https://react.dev/).

# Details
Files were exported from https://github.com/DefinitelyTyped/DefinitelyTyped/tree/master/types/react.

## Additional Details
 * Last updated: Mon, 11 Dec 2023 18:07:24 GMT
 * Dependencies: [@types/prop-types](https://npmjs.com/package/@types/prop-types), [@types/scheduler](https://npmjs.com/package/@types/scheduler), [csstype](https://npmjs.com/package/csstype)
 * Global values: none
